title: Men on the mend
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Kenneth J. Fairbairn
brief_description: An employee injured in the Western Region Railway Workshops goes to the Rehabilitation Workshop at Swindon. There, together with other men, he exercises his injured limb on machines especially built or adapted for the purpose, and turns out articles necessary to British Railways. After a reduced period convalescence he returns, fully recovered to duty.
